useCase.name: Access Platform and Retrieve Settings

successEndConditions.condition: Depositor successfully accesses platform and retrieves settings

useCase.trigger: User requests access to the platform and retrieval of settings

mainSequence.step: User Interface receives access request and forwards it to Authentication Service
Authentication Service confirms successful authentication to User Interface
User Interface requests familiar interface from System Integration
System Integration fetches user preferences from University Systems
University Systems provide user-specific settings to System Integration
System Integration applies settings and customization to the User Interface
User Interface requests integration features from System Integration
System Integration fetches integration capabilities from University Systems
University Systems provide integration capabilities to System Integration
System Integration integrates with University Systems and forwards interface to Data Management Platform
Data Management Platform renders unified management interface
Data Management Platform confirms the readiness of the interface to User Interface
User Interface displays familiar, integrated interface to Depositor
